Introduction & Background

I am a Student Assistant working since 6 years at University Library at Freie Universität Berlin and studying physics. I am experienced in scientific modeling and data analysis.
I have a good knowledge of Python, C and Mathematica and have worked with SVN, Git and Gradle. I am experienced in Kotlin, Java, JavaScript, C# and unit testing. I enjoy programming with a focus on good development practices, automation and a minimal footprint.
I have also gained experience and knowledge of other technologies from several side projects and research that I have undertaken in my free time, including Machine Learning and Android Development.
